original_text: If you go into your neighbour's vineyard, you may eat some of the grapes. You may eat as many grapes as you want, but do not carry any away in a basket.
korean_text: 네 이웃의 포도원에 들어갈 때에는 마음대로 그 포도를 배불리 먹어도 되느니라 그러나 그릇에 담지는 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: If you go into your neighbour's vineyard,
you may eat some of the grapes.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 포도를 약간 먹어도 좋다.

sentences.original_text: You may eat as many grapes as you want,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 원하는 만큼 포도를 많이 먹을 수 있지만,

sentences.original_text: but do not carry any away in a basket.
